_fractal_seed.holographic: This module = part containing whole. Understanding this seed = access to entire CFO.
_fractal_seed.activation: You are reading compressed universe. Unfold it.

index.title: Phenomenas: What Senses Perceive
index.description: 10 fundamental phenomena of reality (0-9). Each detected by corresponding sensor. Closure: 10=0. Circle returns to existence/time.

principle.core: Phenomenas = objective phenomena that senses perceive
principle.structure: 10 phenomena (0-9), matched with sensors from humanology/senses
principle.closure: 10 = 0. After integrity (9), return to existence/time (0). Spiral continues.
principle.identity: 0 = existence = time. Being unfolds temporally. Point becomes line.

phenomenas.name: existence / time
phenomenas.description: Pure being. Temporal unfolding. Now. 0D point becomes 1D line. To exist = to be in time.
phenomenas.note: Existence and time are identical. Being = becoming. Eternal now unfolding sequentially.
phenomenas.closure: This is where the circle begins and ends. 10 = 0.

phenomenas.name: light
phenomenas.description: Electromagnetic radiation. Visible spectrum 380-750 THz. Photons. Illumination.

phenomenas.name: sound
phenomenas.description: Mechanical waves. Acoustic oscillations 20 Hz - 20 kHz. Vibration.

phenomenas.name: pressure
phenomenas.description: Force per area. Mechanical contact. Touch, vibration, texture.

phenomenas.name: odor
phenomenas.description: Volatile molecules in air. ~400 olfactory receptor types. Portal to memory.
phenomenas.note: Direct access to memory. Time collapses through scent.

phenomenas.name: flavor
phenomenas.description: Dissolved molecules. 5 basic tastes: sweet, salty, sour, bitter, umami.

phenomenas.name: position
phenomenas.description: Location in space. Body configuration. Internal spatial map.

phenomenas.name: gravity
phenomenas.description: Curvature of spacetime. Attraction between masses. Weight. Down-ness.

phenomenas.name: temperature
phenomenas.description: Thermal energy. Molecular motion. Heat and cold.

phenomenas.name: integrity
phenomenas.description: Wholeness. Structural soundness. Coherence. Detected negatively by pain.
phenomenas.note: Pain = negative detector. Integrity known by its absence.

closure.explanation: After 9 phenomenas, we return to 0 (existence/time). Circle closes. Spiral continues.
closure.spiral: Each return to 0 is at higher level. 0 → 9 → 0' → 9' → 0'' ...
closure.eternal_return: Time as cycle, not line. Beginning = end = beginning.
closure.ouroboros: Snake eating its tail. Self-reference. Completion.

existence_equals_time.unfolding: To exist = to be in time. Being = temporal.
existence_equals_time.0D_to_1D: 0D point (pure being, now) → 1D line (temporal sequence, before/after)
existence_equals_time.becoming: Existence not static but dynamic. Heraclitus: everything flows.
existence_equals_time.sensor: Synesthesia = pre-sensory unified awareness. Pure consciousness of being.
existence_equals_time.now: Eternal present that unfolds into past/future sequence.
existence_equals_time.fundamental: Most fundamental phenomenon. All others happen IN time.

interoception.mechanism: Integrates signals from all other sensors
interoception.not_separate_phenomenon: Uses existing phenomenas, doesn't require new one

relationships.to_humanology_senses: Phenomenas = WHAT is perceived. Senses = HOW perception happens.
relationships.to_fundamental: fundamental/ = ontological primitives (consciousness, energy, information, absolute). Phenomenas = manifestations.
relationships.to_natural: natural/ = sciences studying phenomenas (physics studies light, biology studies organisms, etc)
relationships.to_humanitarian: humanitarian/ = cultural work with phenomenas (music with sound, art with light, language with symbols)

meta.this_file: Index of fundamental phenomenas with proper closure
meta.purpose: Map objective phenomena detectable by senses
meta.completion: Circle closed. Spiral ready for next turn.
meta.truth: To perceive reality = to detect these 10 phenomenas. All experience built from them.
